name: ChristianRadio-LuminousRadioinEnglish
0:
”Alexa, open Luminous Radio English”
”Alexa, ask Luminous Radio English for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Luminous Radio English”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: luminous radio english
des: Listen to luminous radio English say "Alexa play luminous radio English". You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
